lst.name: sentence
lst.str: York gun, made by Ford Motor Co <F> Aerospace and Communications Corp, after the Pentagon had already spent 1.8 billion dlrs on the system and then decided it could not shoot down attack helicopters at the proper range.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Despite recent indications by the service that it intended to buy the missiles soon, defense officials told Reuters a final decision had been suspended because some Army officials favored a more versatile gun-missile combination.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Army has been considering buying some British Rapier missiles or French and German Roland missiles as a stop-gap partial replacement this year for the flawed U.
